name: Depth of Styx
description:
Warning

- recommended to play on Chrome (may lag on other browsers)

Controls

- W, A, S, D to steer

- Left Mouse Button to shoot

- Space to use Power-ups

Instructions

Join Charon in his epic adventure to the depths of the river Styx. Manevuer the boat, face evil spirits and try not to die under the pressure of the sheer number of enemies. 

Your health bar, level progress bar and souls count are visible in the lower right side of the screen. 

Description

The game was created for 48th Ludum Dare Jam in 72 hours by a team of five (with a little help).

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/$233822

The topic of the game jam was Deeper and deeper. 

 We hope you enjoy this short game. Have fun! 

Development team

- ciekuds aka Pan Węzio Lovemaker

- deav

- Diler

- Kongo

- orpuwupetup

Additional thanks to Boberkraft for implementing lighting system.
